explains: v. 使醒悟，使不再抱幻想

sentences.en: There is a whole world of anxiety and disillusion behind those bald employment figures.
sentences.cn: 在那些光秃秃的就业数字背后是整个世界的焦虑和幻灭。

sentences.en: I'd hate to be the one to disillusion him.
sentences.cn: 我不愿做打破他梦想的人。

sentences.en: There is disillusion with established political parties.
sentences.cn: 对各个确立的政党有幻灭感。
